text: Goodnight Miss Ann is a 1978 American short documentary film directed by August Cinquegrana. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short The Academy Film Archive preserved Goodnight Miss Ann in 2012. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1978 films Category:1978 short films Category:1978 documentary films Category:American films Category:American documentary films Category:English-language films Category:Short documentary films
title: Goodnight Miss Ann
